meaningMnemonic: If the <kanji>neglect</kanji> of an area <kanji>surpass</kanji>es what was expected, then the result will be <vocabulary>depopulation</vocabulary>. No one wants to live in a neglected town, especially one that's worse than what they were told.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
